item.title: How do I make it when I use
item.dc:creator: @Lin Lin
item.description:
@Lin wrote:

How do I make it so I can use an item with an object and get something? (Im a pretty good coder, so its kinda embarrasing to ask this)I can add objects, and I know how to. I know how to make it when you use an item with another item, you get this one item. I just dont know how to make it so when you use an object like a net with water, you get a fish. I have studied the fishing and cooking in my client.java, and when I go to add it, I get ONE error, and I have trouble making it. This is what i usually put:

else if(atObjectID == 43 && useItemID == 503) { addItem(4653, 1); addSkillXP(50000, 10); sendMessage("You need a higher fishing level to catch that fish."); }

And I always end up with 1 error. Can someone tell me what Im doing wrong?

Read full topic
item.source: How do I make it when I use
